channel.title: Dadmother - E L E K T R O P H O N I K (electro/UK dub)
channel.description:
I apologize for doubling up on this board, BUT:
This is another track I’ve been sitting on for a VERY long time that I’ve been revisiting and working on. I was a big fan of NIN, KMFDM, and a lot of the 90s and early 00s electro and dub sounds coming from the UK growing up (particularly Prodigy [RIP Keith Flint ✊]) and was inspired by that sound when I started on this track.
https://soundcloud.com/dadmother/e-l-e-k-t-r-o-p-h-o-n-i-k/s-t2b7G
*would recommend listening on headphones/speakers/in your car

item.title: Dadmother - E L E K T R O P H O N I K (electro/UK dub)
item.dc:creator: Dadmother
item.description:
Oh man, the CLASSICS. I used to request Fatboy Slim at my local skating rink when I was younger. Too good. Thank you for the kind words friend!

Read full topic
item.source: Dadmother - E L E K T R O P H O N I K (electro/UK dub)

item.title: Dadmother - E L E K T R O P H O N I K (electro/UK dub)
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Awesome, another good one emphasizing the inspirations I hear em all in there. Chemical beats / breakbeat was so very good, I do miss it. I don’t know what it ended up falling out of favor for/to, but stuff like Fatboy Slim, The Chemical Brothers, Orbital (everytime I Hear Halcyon + On + On I think I pass out) - so good.

Read full topic
item.source: Dadmother - E L E K T R O P H O N I K (electro/UK dub)
